alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 8:44PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Livingston County through 930 PM EDT... At 844 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cohoctah, or 8 miles north of Howell, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hartland around 905 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Conway Township, Tyrone Township and Deerfield Township. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
